name: ListAccessGroupMembers
description:
Retrieve members of a specific access group.

This tool calls the API to list all members within a specified access group. Use it to retrieve member information for management or review purposes.

parameters.name: access_group_id_or_name
parameters.description: Specify the ID or name of the access group to list its members.

value_schema.description: The ID or name of the Access Group.

parameters.name: member_limit
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of access group members to return.

value_schema.description: Limit how many access group members should be returned.

parameters.name: continuation_cursor_for_paging
parameters.description: Cursor used to retrieve the next page of access group members.

value_schema.description: Continuation cursor to retrieve the next page of results.

parameters.name: member_search_query
parameters.description: Search for members using their name, username, or email.

value_schema.description: Search project members by their name, username, and email.

parameters.name: team_identifier
parameters.description: The Team identifier for which to list access group members.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: team_slug
parameters.description: The unique slug of the team for which you want to list access group members.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the vercel API.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit how many access group members should be returned.

value_schema.description: Limit how many access group members should be returned.

parameters.name: next
parameters.description: Continuation cursor to retrieve the next page of results.

value_schema.description: Continuation cursor to retrieve the next page of results.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search project members by their name, username, and email.

value_schema.description: Search project members by their name, username, and email.

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: idOrName
parameters.description: The ID or name of the Access Group.

value_schema.description: The ID or name of the Access Group.
